author: AngelCalvo
body:
<!-- PR checklist -->
- [x] Resolves issue #xyz.
- [ ] Code is up-to-date with `master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](../docs).

<!-- Provide more details about the PR below -->

comments.author: AngelCalvo
comments.body: Changed title to Official name (Visual Studio Code) vs VS Code

comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body:
@AngelCalvo Thanks for the contribution

Here are a couple of other markdowns that have references to the phrase 'VS Code'

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/7e8e8592e3d6bde67314d0e36994a7f35bfab0ff/docs/learning-powerShell/using-ise.md

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/397b7b639c1258323f00a086a4a0d2d6f266adc4/docs/learning-powerShell/powershell-beginners-guide.md

Please update them as well!

comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body: @AngelCalvo I updated the other docs as well to reflect VS => Visual Studio

title: Update README.md
